::Magmatron/Dachande::

    "Yes, I did," He said. Then he turned to Dachan=
de, who converted to robot mode. "Go and help them." Dachande did.
    He t=
urned back to Kit Kat. "I don't know what your plans are for the Alliance, =
but you have my word that I will use all my troops to help. But something s=
truck me, I don't know if you thought of it: War by Attrition. I don't know=
 our numbers, or thiers, but it seems that if we send one massive attack we=
 might suffer more casualities then if we sent a group of let's say ten. Th=
en when they get the word the retreat and another group of ten starts to at=
tack.
    "This proboly only work if we could repair the troops. Meaning a =
CR Chamber area. I have CR Chambers and portable generators that can be in =
a good position within the hour. But we would also need Autoguns, and my ba=
se doesn't have extra.
    "That is why I am coming to you, I would like to=
 help you, in return for your help in the future."
    He finished looking =
her in the eye. He made a slight bowing movement.
  ----- Original Message =
----- 
  From: logomorph@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Mon=
day, November 13, 2000 5:04 PM
  Subject: Re: Message to Kit Kat


  :KitKa=
t::

  She opened her comlink. "Destructor, you'd better get back here. 
  =
We're movng. Now."

  She saw on the scanners that Magmatronw as outside th=
e base.
  She opened her link. "DarkMouse, meet me at the entrance."
  She =
gave Quickstrike the co-ordinants to the  new base. "Get everyone 
  over t=
here. I'll follow shortly."

  DarkMouse walked over to the entrance and me=
t with KitKat.  KitKat 
  motioned for the mouse to follow her to the meeti=
ng with Magmatron.


  KitKat looked at Magmatron. "Yes, you wanted to talk=
?"


  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
  > :=
:Magmatron/Dachande::
  > 
  >     "Understood," He said and shut the comm =
down. Then he opened a 
  comm to 'Dachande'. "Cyber...Dachande, please mee=
t me outside Kit 
  Kat's base, you are helping we with a situation, it mig=
ht provide 
  some hunting."
  >     "No way," Dachande said, then a shock =
of electricty went 
  through him. "Did you do that?"
  >     "Yes, of cour=
se," Magmatron said. He then pressed another 
  button and Dachande transfo=
rmed to Beast Mode, decloaking in the 
  process. He then went to Kit Kat's=
 base.
  >     Magmatron set the autoguns and went to Kit Kat's base.
